deregisterBaseToken(address,address).details: Only used by `ClearingHouse` contract, this function is expensive, due to for loop

params.baseToken: The address of the trader's base token

returns.traderAccountInfo: The baseToken account info of trader

returns.baseAmount: The base amount of trader's baseToken market

returns._0: liquidatablePositionSize The liquidatable position size of trader's baseToken market

getMarginRequirementForLiquidation(addre.details: This is different from `Vault._getTotalMarginRequirement()`, which is for freeCollateral calculation

returns.marginRequirementForLiquidation: It is compared with `ClearingHouse.getAccountValue` which is also an int

returns.owedRealizedPnl: the pnl realized already but stored temporarily in AccountBalance
returns.pendingFee: the pending fee of maker earned

returns.quoteAmount: The quote amount of trader's baseToken market

returns.openNotional: The taker cost of trader's baseToken

getTakerPositionSize(address,address).details: This will only has taker position, can get maker impermanent position through `getTotalPositionSize`

returns.takerPositionSize: The taker position size of trader's baseToken market

returns.totalAbsPositionValue: Sum up positions value of every market

getTotalDebtValue(address).details: Total debt value will relate to `Vault.getFreeCollateral()`

returns.totalOpenNotional: the amount of quote token paid for a position when opening

getTotalPositionSize(address,address).details: `total position size = taker position size + maker impermanent position size`

returns.totalPositionSize: The total position size of trader's baseToken market

getTotalPositionValue(address,address).details: A negative returned value is only be used when calculating pnl,we use `15 mins` twap to calc position value

returns.totalPositionValue: Total position value of trader's baseToken market

params.baseToken: The address of the trader's base token

params.makerFee: Amount of maker fee collected from pool

params.baseToken: The address of the trader's base token

returns.closedPrice: The closed price of the closed market
returns.positionNotional: Taker's position notional settled with closed price

getLiquidatablePositionSize(address,addr.notice: Get liquidatable position size of trader's baseToken market

getMarginRequirementForLiquidation(addre.notice: Get margin requirement to check whether trader will be able to liquidate

getPnlAndPendingFee(address).notice: Get owedRealizedPnl, unrealizedPnl and pending fee

getTakerOpenNotional(address,address).notice: Get taker cost of trader's baseToken

getTakerPositionSize(address,address).notice: Get taker position size of trader's baseToken market

getTotalAbsPositionValue(address).notice: Get all market position abs value of trader

getTotalDebtValue(address).notice: Get total debt value of trader

getTotalOpenNotional(address,address).notice: Get total cost of trader's baseToken

getTotalPositionSize(address,address).notice: Get total position size of trader's baseToken market

getTotalPositionValue(address,address).notice: Get total position value of trader's baseToken market

hasOrder(address).notice: Check trader has open order in open/closed market.

registerBaseToken(address,address).notice: Every time a trader's position value is checked, the base token list of this trader will be traversed; thus, this list should be kept as short as possible

settleBalanceAndDeregister(address,addre.notice: Settle account balance and deregister base token

settlePositionInClosedMarket(address,add.notice: Settle trader's PnL in closed market
